paper_abstract: In this paper, we investigate the new stability, superstability and hyperstability of the cubic Lie derivations associated with the system of general cubic functional equations: {f(xy) = x(3) f(y) + f(x)y(3,) f(x + ky) - kf(x + y) + kf(x - y) - f(x - ky) = 2k(k(2) - 1)f(y) in Banach algebras.
paper_title: A Fixed Point Approach to Stability of Cubic Lie Derivatives in Banach Algebras
